name: SAMUDAYAK HEALTH WELFARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: Samudayak Health Welfare Society (Reg. No.DIC -664)  is registered N GO Working in the distt. Nawanshahar and Ludhiana.  Our main aim is to create awareness in the masses at grass root level So far we have successfully organized a large number of programmes in rural and urban areas against HIV/ Aids, Female feticides, Drug addiction and  environment pollutionOur organization comprise of Doctors, Teachers and Para â€“ medics, We got an award from Honorable governor of Punjab for our services to the community. Now we are planning to launch a drug de addiction programme at large scale. As drug abuse is  spreading at much fast pace in the Doaba region of Punjab .
